game.name: Green Diamond
game.description:
Do you think yourself as the biggest diamond collector? Huh! Hold down friend! You cannot beat the challenges prepared here in this brand new arcade challenge where the invaluable diamond is waiting for you. When you click the play button and start the first level, you would find yourself in an ancient place where the treasure box is hidden in the bottom. Suddenly your eyes are kept on some priceless green diamonds which are handing through a chain.

Your objective in this HTML5 puzzle game is to move obstacles and cut the chain to grab the diamonds to chest in each level. There is no limit to complete the puzzle, but make sure to escape from there by spotting some useful objects. You can interact with the objects by clicking on them. You cannot move the next level unless you solve the present puzzle. Use your brain and puzzle-solving abilities to get you through 20 unique and challenging levels!

Try to collect all the money you see along the level to upgrade your game and make it more interesting and challenging! The complexities of the puzzle keep increasing as you progress in the game. Play this cool puzzle game in your device for free and enjoy the finest arcade experience without download! Stay connected with us to spot new arcade challenges and have a wonderful gaming experience with your friends! Good luck to complete all puzzles and prove you as the biggest puzzle solver!
